name: MahatmaGandhiFact
0:
”Alexa, open mahatma gandhi fact and tell me about bapu”
”Alexa, ask mahatma gandhi fact to tell me a fact about mahatma gandhi”
”Alexa, launch mahatma gandhi fact and tell me about father of nation”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mahatma gandhi fact
des:
Mahatma Gandhi was a great Indian leader. He played a very important role in providing freedom to his nation from British colonial rule.
This skill will make you know about some of the major achievements of his life.
The new generation must know about him.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
